name: Poppem
description:
Gotta pop 'em all in Poppem!

That toothy, mean old Bombem wants to spoil all the happy Poppem's fun. Pop him up and off the screen by tapping on the adorable Poppems below him to keep them safe! Keep the Bombem from exploding as long as you can for higher scores and more Poppems saved!

Adorn Poppems' heads with fantastic hats as they hide from the Bombem! Poppems can wear berets, viking helmets, and fezzes - oh my! Check out what looks best on YOUR Poppems now!
